text: Steven Douglas Symms (April 23, 1938 - August 8, 2024) was an American Republican politician. He was a four-term congressman from 1973 to 1981 and a two-term U.S. Senator from 1981 to 1993, representing Idaho. Symms died at his home in Leesburg, Virginia, on August 8, 2024, at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2024 deaths Category:United States senators from Idaho Category:United States representatives from Idaho Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Steve Symms
